name: Rogue Planet 1: Golden Hour
description:
What is RP1?

A simple GameGuru FPS with 3 years of hard work, dedication, and iteration. A genuine passion project attempting to bring back the magic of the now-defunct LucasArts.

Would you save the world, knowing you'd leave all you loved behind? Or would you doom it, knowing you'd have your friends? Destiny Nigh.

Features:

Campaign:

- 2-3 Hour Singleplayer Campaign

- FPS Action Horror

- Surreal Visuals

- Original Music by the Talented folks of Rogues Unrivaled.

- Co-Op Story mode (See disclaimer)

- Limited Mod Support (See disclaimer)

Multiplayer:

- Online Multiplayer

- 5 Multiplayer Maps

- 2 Modes (TDM and DM)

- New Weapons

- Full mod support via Black Ice Mod Tools.

- Reshade Support (Disclaimer Below.)

- And much more!

DISCLAIMER:

Singleplayer mods legally require a copy of (GameGuru Classic public-release-2020.12.16 - Christmas Fixes) to make since the GameGuru engine is the legal IP of The Game Creators LTD, and is currently sold on Steam.

Reshade uses shaders, filters, and overlays that can trigger epilepsy or induce seizures in extreme circumstances. Use at your own risk.

Co-Op Campaign requires a copy of (GameGuru Classic public-release-2020.12.16 - Christmas Fixes) to play.
